Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivateProductionController, ActivateProductionUpdateController, ActivateVaticanReportPopupController, BuyDevCardController, BuyDevCardPopupController, ChooseActionController, ErrorPopupController, ExitController, GenericPopupController, HomeController, InfoController, LeaderActionController, LeaderActionPopupController, LeaderChoiceController, LobbyController, LorenzoPlayedPopupController, MoveActionController, MultiModeWinnerMessageController, PlayerBoardController, PositioningResourcesController, ResourceChoiceController, SelectModeController, SelectNumOfPlayersController, SoloModeWinnerMessageController, TakeResourcesController, TakeResPopupController, UserNameController, ViewDashBoardController, ViewOtherPlayersController
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Main controller of all GUI scenes It is used to set the background and scene borders of each page Contains all generic methods that are used in all Controller classes of GUI pages
